EngineRule.ruleSpecification:
<AttributeValues objType="wt.part.WTPart"> <!--CATL--> <AttrValue id="number" algorithm="com.catl.part.CatlPartNewNumber"> <Attr id="cls"/> </AttrValue> <!-- set the lifecycle --> <AttrValue id="lifeCycle.id" algorithm="com.ptc.core.foundation.lifecycle.server.impl.LifeCycleTemplateAttributeAlgorithm"> <Arg>LC_Part_Cycle</Arg> </AttrValue>
<!-- set the version info to a generated version info --> <AttrValue id="MBA|versionInfo" algorithm="com.ptc.core.foundation.vc.server.impl.VersionInfoGenerator"> <Arg>wt.series.HarvardSeries.StateBased</Arg> </AttrValue> </AttributeValues>
